typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ESTAB_IDCIGAM as string,
		CLIENTE_CODIGO as double,
		CLIENTE_NOME as string,
		CLIENTE_CPFCNPJ as string,
		CLIENTE_EMAIL as string,
		CLIENTE_CIDADE as string,
		CLIENTE_ESTADO as string,
		CLIENTE_SEXO as string,
		CLIENTE_ANIVERSARIO as timestamp,
		CLIENTE_DDD_CELULAR as string,
		CLIENTE_CELULAR as string,
		CLIENTE_ENDERECO as string,
		CLIENTE_NUMERO as string,
		CLIENTE_COMPLEMENTO as string,
		CLIENTE_BAIRRO as string,
		CLIENTE_CEP as string,
		NUM_MATRICULA as string,
		DAT_HORA_EXPORTACAO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	modifiedAfter: (toTimestamp(concat(toString(currentDate()), ' 00:00:00'), 'MM/dd/yy HH:mm:ss', 'UTC')),
	modifiedBefore: (currentUTC()),
	format: 'parquet') ~> Origem
